episode_title: How Facebook Ads Nearly Killed This $12.5M Brand with Hans Dose

You went on the shark tank, pitched a product, and then you built that business into a 12 and a half million dollar business in top line revenue. And then you saw what was coming down the pipe. You saw


the changes that were happening with relation to our trade standing with China. And you were like, e-commerce, consumer facing products have no idea what's about to hit them. Why aren't we on-shoring? Why aren't we reshoring? Nobody's manufacturing silicone, which is an integral product in every single one of our retail products. And you started looking around, there was nobody who was doing it. And so you decided, I'm going to start a manufacturing company in California of all places to re-onshore silicone.


which like just all of those moves in a row are incredible adventures. But I think what I have to ask you first is, do you ever get tired?
